LearningRequirementsSchema.description: Represents the serializable schema of the requirements of an ability

ItemRequirements.description: The items and their amounts required to learn this ability

PrerequisiteSkills.description: The skills that must be learned before this ability can be learned

PrerequisiteSpells.description: The spells that must be learned before this ability can be learned

RequiredGold.description: The amount of gold required to learn this ability

RequiredStats.description: The attributes required to learn this skill

ItemRequirementSchema.description: Represents the serializable schema of the requirements of an item needed to learn an ability

AmountRequired.description: The amount of this item required to learn the ability

ItemTemplateKey.description: The key of the item template required to learn the ability

AbilityRequirementSchema.description: Represents the serializable schema of a prerequisite ability requirement

Level.description:
If specified, the level of the prerequisite ability. If not specified, uses the max level of the prerequisite
ability

TemplateKey.description: The key of the prerequisite ability

StatsSchema.description: Represents the serializable schema of stats

SpellType.description: A byte representing the type of a spell. Used by ServerOpCode.AddSpellToPane

PanelEntityTemplateSchema.description: Represents the serializable schema for a panel object template

AbilityLevel.description: The ability level required to use this entity

AdvClass.description:
Defaults to null

If specified, this is the advanced class required to use this entity

Class.description:
Defaults to null

If specified, this is the base class required to use this entity

CooldownMs.description:
Defaults to null

If specified, any on-use effect of this object will use this cooldown

Description.description:
Defaults to null

A brief description of this entity

Level.description: The level required to use this entity

Name.description: The base name of the entity

PanelSprite.description: The sprite id used to display the entity in it's respective panel (no offset)

RequiresMaster.description: Whether or not this entity requires you to be a master

ScriptKeys.description:
A collection of names of scripts to attach to this object by default. The name of a script is just the name of the
class without "Script" at the end.

ScriptVars.description:
A collection of key-value pairs of key-value pairs

Each script that has variables needs a scriptName-Value pair, and the value of that entry is a dictionary of
propertyName-Value pairs

TemplateKey.description: A unique id specific to this template. This must match the file name

AdvClass.description: A byte representing the 'medenia class' of an aisling. Used in many places.

BaseClass.description: A byte representing the 'temuair class' of an aisling. Used in many places.

allOf.description: Represents the serializable schema for a spell template

CastLines.description: The number of chant lines this spell requires by default

LearningRequirements.description:
Default null

If set, these are the requirements for the spell to be learned

LevelsUp.description: Whether or not the spell is capable of leveling up. If false, the spell will start at level 100

MaxLevel.description:
Defaults to null

If set, this is the maximum level the spell can be leveled up to

Prompt.description:
Defaults to null

Should be specified with a spell type of "Prompt", this is the prompt the spell will offer when used in game

SpellType.description: The way the spell is cast by the player
